price: Atyre (Allahu) do t’u thotë: “Mos u grindni para Meje, Unë ju kam paralajmëruar me kohë.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
